_sText:
Inspired by Aoki's works I've decided to make another awful map based on lvl 9's style of exodus. Features: -Prepare to waste some hours of your life on 30 levels. -The most hardcore players can enjoy 3 bonuses. -Twice butthurt compared to asdfiasoi...w/e the name of that map. -Gay textures will make girls scream and boys rage.
The map is simply amazing, sadly nobody will make it to the end.
Atx
What a sucky exodus rip off.
AsuX
I came..
Epic
The More You Know
None of textures were stolen from bhop_exodus, I've just borrowed the idea for a trikz map. If you don't trust or something else, you can either gtfo and remove this map from %fagname%\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps or stop whining and enjoy it with your trikz partner. Most of dev textures were edited via Photoshop, other were taken from hl2\materials\tools and hl2\materials\dev. kthxbai.
